skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

skillTree.name: Chaos Warshrine
skillTree.description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: Manticores are highly prized by Sorcerers, for they are creatures bathed in magic and as cruel as their riders.

skillTree.name: Chaos Dragon
skillTree.description: Chaos Dragons were once noble rulers of the skies, now split and corrupted by the forces of Change.

skillTree.name: Undivided Authority
skillTree.description: The Ruinous Powers tighten their grip on the land, as dark sorcery paves the way for their fell influence.

skillTree.name: Infernal Champion
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Corrupt Mage
skillTree.description: Magic and Chaos are eternally intertwined in a symbiotic storm of malevolent power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn
	(Lord's army)

Miscast base chance: +15% for all enemy spellcasters
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Malefic Sorcerer
skillTree.description: Magic need not only wreak havoc at range—half the fun of battle, after all, is seeing the fear in your enemy's eyes.

skillTree.name: Vile Enchanter
skillTree.description: The Forsaken heed the commands of the powerful, and thrive on the excess of their energy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Forsaken, Chaos Spawn and Chaos Feral Manticore units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Forsaken
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chaos Marked
skillTree.description: Kill, crush, destroy—these are the tenets of Chaos!

skillTree.name: Ruinous Seal
skillTree.description: Pain is a trivial price to pay in assuring the complete annihilation of Order!

skillTree.name: Brand of Turmoil
skillTree.description: The brand of the Ruinous Powers is seared into the skin, a mark of absolute dedication to the cause of corruption.

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Enfeebling Foe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Withering Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Savage Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Warp Fire
skillTree.description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for all Daemonic flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all Daemonic missile units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for all Daemonic flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all Daemonic missile units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hammer into Anvil
skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monstrous Strength
skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Doomfire
skillTree.description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all war beasts, monstrous, and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Malevolent Ranger
skillTree.description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Devoted of Chaos
skillTree.description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description:
Increased experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

Increased experience gain: +15% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

Increased experience gain: +20% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Foetid Gallipot
skillTree.description: A pungent mix of fell unguents ensures the unholy vitality of one’s minions.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Evil
skillTree.description: For one fighting with the favour of the Ruinous Powers, glory and riches come naturally.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
	(Lord's army)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.name: Chaos Unchained
skillTree.description: All will bow before such a harbinger of pure, unbridled Chaos, oozing with the energies of corruption.

backgroundSkills.description: Secret skill that automatically levels up as the character progresses and reduces cost of Path to Glory

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Burning Body
backgroundSkills.description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.

backgroundSkills.name: Chaos Familiar
backgroundSkills.description: A Chaos Familiar memorises spells on its master's behalf, constantly rehearsing for its big moment until it is called upon to share its arcane knowledge.

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Fury
backgroundSkills.description: Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.

backgroundSkills.name: Evil Eyeball
backgroundSkills.description: Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.

backgroundSkills.name: Hideous Visage
backgroundSkills.description: The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

backgroundSkills.name: Iron Skin
backgroundSkills.description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.

backgroundSkills.name: Scaled Skin
backgroundSkills.description: The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.

backgroundSkills.name: Opened Eyes
backgroundSkills.description: Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.

backgroundSkills.name: Mystifying Miasma [HIDDEN]
backgroundSkills.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

backgroundSkills.name: Nurgle's Rot
backgroundSkills.description: Nurgle's Rot is the most dreaded and contagious of all diseases, for it gnaws at the victim's soul as well as his mortal body.

effects.description: Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Nurgle

backgroundSkills.name: Nurgle's Rot
backgroundSkills.description: Nurgle's Rot is the most dreaded and contagious of all diseases, for it gnaws at the victim's soul as well as his mortal body.

effects.description: Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Nurgle

backgroundSkills.name: Nurgle's Rot
backgroundSkills.description: Nurgle's Rot is the most dreaded and contagious of all diseases, for it gnaws at the victim's soul as well as his mortal body.

effects.description: Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Nurgle

backgroundSkills.name: Nurgle's Rot
backgroundSkills.description: Nurgle's Rot is the most dreaded and contagious of all diseases, for it gnaws at the victim's soul as well as his mortal body.

effects.description: Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Nurgle

backgroundSkills.name: Third Eye of Tzeentch
backgroundSkills.description: A third eye opens in the favoured one's forehead that can see the shifting strands of fate.

effects.description: Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Tzeentch
